name: Breakfast Time
description: Morning meal, the first meal of the day.

name: Mid-Morning Snack Time
description: A light snack or drink to sustain energy mid-morning.

name: Lunch Time
description: Main meal of the day, often around midday.

name: Afternoon Snack Time
description: A light snack, tea, or coffee break in the afternoon.

name: Dinner Time
description: Evening meal, usually the final meal of the day.

name: Late-Night Snack Time
description: Light snack or drink before bed, sometimes optional.
